message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. I'm asking for $150 for it.  What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay up to $130. Looking forward to your response.
Bob, I appreciate your offer.  I'm willing to go down to $140. This is a fair price for this high-quality product. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I can definitely consider purchasing at $135. Looking forward to your response.
